Name: Rebels - Under the Spell of Magic (Chapter 2)
About the game: The game is a linear visual novel. It has a few choices, but they do not have an impact on the ending, instead they provide different content to the reader. This is a continuation of Chapter 1. It is highly recommended to play through the 1st Chapter, before starting this one. Join Folken as he starts his first adventure in a world that is reigned by magic. Dive into the complex world of this fantasy story and discover creatures, lore, abilities and a lot of characters with unique personalities. There are 23 CG's to unlock. A single playthrough takes about 3 to 4 hours. Story After the tragic events of last night, Folken starts his first adventure together with his first friend. It is a perilous undertaking just to get a few answers, and to make the responsible person explain her actions. Can they reach their destination and fulfill their goal? And even if the answer is yes, what then?
